(kuipers@cs.utexas.edu) Highlights QSIM in Parallel Hardware A significant barrier to application of QSIM to large-scale problems is the efficiency of qualitative simulation. Graz in Austria have designed and implemented a special-purpose parallel hardware architecture for qualitative simulation.
